name: Duality (itch) (ciaosonocampa, LeSimo, Federico Raso, valparahiso, Giodavi96)
name_original: Duality (itch) (ciaosonocampa, LeSimo, Federico Raso, valparahiso, Giodavi96)
description:
Duality is an online multiplayer game where two players control the same FPS-character, one controls the movement and the other does the shooting. 

The two players must cooperate to survive but also compete for resources.

The prototype includes a single player mode, but it is intended to be played multiplayer only.

This is the final final project for "Game design" course at Politecnico di Torino, computer engineering department.

The project includes the game prototype, trailer and a game pitch document.

Game prototype source code (Unity Version 2020.3.3f1 project)
